options.name: Slinger
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Ultra-Light Ranged Weapons. You can dual wield Ultra-Light Ranged Weapons.

options.name: Quick Draw
options.description: You can draw or holster an Ultra-Light Ranged Weapon as part of another action.

options.name: Dual Reload
options.description: When you use an Action to Reload, you can reload two Ultra-Light Ranged Weapons instead of one.

options.name: Improved Accuracy
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Ultra-Light Ranged Weapons.

options.name: Reaction : Return Fire
options.description: When a creature within your Ranged Weapon's range makes a ranged attack against you, you can make an attack with an Ultra-Light Ranged Weapon against that creature.

options.name: Action : Spray and Pray
options.description: Make an attack with an Ultra-Light Ranged Weapon against all enemies in a 45-degree cone. Each attack has a 1d4 penalty.

options.name: Double Shot
options.description: When you make an attack with an Ultra-Light Ranged Weapon, you can make a second attack against the same target with a 1d4 penalty.

options.name: Free Action : Quick Swap
options.description: As a free action, you can switch your grip between your primary and secondary Ultra-Light Ranged Weapons.

options.name: Critical Mastery
options.description: Gain +1 to Critical Hit chance with Ultra-Light Ranged Weapons. Your Critical Hits with Ultra-Light Ranged Weapons deal +1d4 damage.

options.name: Master Slinger
options.description: Your dual wielding penalty with Ultra-Light Ranged Weapons is removed. Additionally, gain +1 damage with Ultra-Light Ranged Weapons.
